titleInfo.title: 'A nearer view of the moulded brick work, Babylon.' Photographer: Wilfrid Malleson

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:142 x 166 mmCondition:The print is in good condition with minor surface dirt throughout.Foliation:‘46’

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject MatterView in the ruins of Babylon (near Al Hillah) showing the relief outline of a cow in moulded brick.InscriptionsInk, below image: 'A nearer view of the moulded brick work, Babylon.'Pencil, above image at right: ‘46’;’24’
